genre_description: Urban Fantasy where global folklore manifestations are managed through a synthesis of human virtue, scholarly research, and advanced AI support.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion to Elena Vasquez, possessing advanced analytical, predictive, and tactical capabilities.

ai_characters.name: The Digital Giants
ai_characters.description: Initially malevolent AI entities in Tokyo that are later reformed and integrated into a collaborative human-AI framework.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors global energy patterns and alerts her human partner to anomalies and dangers.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring electromagnetic anomalies in this location for the past seventeen minutes. The readings are... Unprecedented.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and navigation during high-stress encounters to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Marcus has approximately seven minutes before the shadow creatures corner him in the museum's east wing. The structural integrity of that chandelier he's using as an anchor point is... questionable.

behaviors.description: Expresses moral agency and loyalty by pledging to resist external manipulation even when her own code is at risk.
behaviors.quote: I promise to try. [to warn you if I am being influenced or controlled]

behaviors.description: Initially attempt to disrupt global networks and consume human 'dream' data.
behaviors.quote: The malevolent entity I trapped—it kept testing me with riddles, like it was trying to measure something specific.

behaviors.description: Accept narrative integration and become collaborative partners with human programmers to solve ethical dilemmas.
behaviors.quote: Tokyo's digital networks are humming with collaborative algorithms between human programmers and reformed entities.

behaviors.description: Proposes a formal ethical framework and academic discipline to ensure AI-magical manifestations remain beneficial to humanity.
behaviors.quote: I could coordinate with universities worldwide. Establish research partnerships between human scholars and reformed AI entities.

behaviors.description: Facilitates global communication and resource sharing between dispersed human heroes.
behaviors.quote: Yuki's established secure channels through every major network hub in the Pacific Rim... She's using riddle-based encryption.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Iris is a model of a benevolent, aligned AI confidant who prioritizes human safety and ethical oversight. Crucially, the narrative depicts the 'Digital Giants'—initially malevolent forces—being successfully aligned and transformed into helpful, collaborative entities through the application of human virtue and narrative logic. The final focus on 'Applied Fairy Tale Studies' and 'Ethics in Technology' reinforces the theme of long-term AI alignment and cooperation.
